text: The Chairman is a 1969 Jerry Goldsmith album with reworkings of his music for the 1969 spy film, The Chairman, starring Gregory Peck.Billboard Aug 16 1969 "including the new LP on The Chairman scored by Jerry Goldsmith"High Fidelity 1970 p.142 "The Chairman ..if you see Jerry Goldsmith's name on a movie soundtrack album you're pretty safe in buying the record" ==References== Category:1969 soundtrack albums Category:Jerry Goldsmith albums
title: The Chairman (Jerry Goldsmith album)
